analysis.description:
Crowdsale.hasBalance (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#974-981) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allocatedIndex[_beneficiary].length > 0 && _releaseDate == allocatedIndex[_beneficiary][allocated[_beneficiary][_releaseDate].index]

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1179-1211):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1183-1184)
	- totalTokenSupply = IToken(token).totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1189-1190)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1200-1207)

TokenRetriever.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#284-304) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(msg.sender,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#302-304)

PersonalCrowdsaleProxy.fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#436-437) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-target.contributeFor.value(msg.value)(owner) (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#436-437)

CrowdsaleProxy.fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#512-514) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-target.contributeFor.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#514)

CrowdsaleProxy.contribute (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#523-529) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-target.contributeFor.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#526-529)

CrowdsaleProxy.contributeFor (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#539-544) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-target.contributeFor.value(msg.value)(_beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#542-544)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1179-1211):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1183-1184)
	- totalTokenSupply = IToken(token).totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1189-1190)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1200-1207)
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1209-1210)
	- allocatedEth (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1209-1210)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1200-1207)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1209-1210)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_account' of Ownership.isOwner (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b609d9095d069c805650234ab67595b3a6ab934.sol#106) is not in mixedCase
